title: ISic020575. ISic020575
body:
1Ἀτίτᾱ

1ΑΤΙΤᾹ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Valentina Mignosa

Italian translation

Valentina Mignosa

commentary

Inscription on a loom weight bearing a name that could probably be the genitive of the name Ἀτίτας, attested in Athens as the name of a potter (Arena IGASM, nr. 114).

bibliography

  • Militello 1960 56, pl. 12d https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002475
  • Orlandini 1962 110 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001465
  • Manganaro 1965 166 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001452
  • Dell'Aira 1965-1966 170, no. 87, pl. 20 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002479
  • Manganaro 1977 1337, n. 37 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001410
  • Dubois 1989 175d https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • Brugnone 1991 55, no. 68 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002474
  • Arena 2002 114, pl. XXXII.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
